data.title: Democratic Clubs – Manhattan Democratic Party
data.text:
Democratic Clubs represent segments or “Parts” of Assembly Districts. Find your Assembly District and Part.

Audubon Reform Democratic Club

District Leader(s): Maria Luna

President: Julio Batista

839 Riverside Drive Apt. 4A

New York, NY 10032

Website: http://ardc.nyc

Email: ardc4nyc@gmail.com
